questions.title: How to set a variable value on receiving a message in telegram bot
questions.description: When I hit the below endpoint, I am able to receive a message on the telegram bot.However, I would like to process the incoming message and set a variable value, For example: when the bot receives a message with text as `onChatEnde`, I would like to modify a Map variable.I tried override the sendMessage method but that doesn't seem to work.

answers.answer: To process incoming messages and set a variable value in a Telegram bot, you can use a library or framework such as python-telegram-bot, which provides an interface to interact with the Telegram Bot API.
